com.ohtu.wearable.wearabledataservice.database

Class SensorDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.ohtu.wearable.wearabledataservice.database.SensorDatabase

  • public class SensorDatabase
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Database for all the sensor data. Storages the name of the SensorUnit and it's values as JSONObjects.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      • getAllSensorData

        public java.util.List<org.json.JSONObject> getAllSensorData(java.lang.String sensorName)
                                                     throws org.json.JSONException
        Gets all the JSON data associated with the sensor. Goes through all the entries in the database and collects data from each event to a list.
        Parameters:
        sensorName - Name of the sensor.
        Returns:
        A Linked List containing all the JSONObjects in the database.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • deleteEntries
